ciphertextblock-instructions.defaultMessage: Below is the encrypted blob. Please save for your reference.
ciphertextblock-instructions.description: Instructions show next to outputted encrypted blob

ciphertextblock-label.description: Label shown directly above outputted encrypted blob

ciphertextblock-title.description: Title for block containing outputted encrypted blob

discovereddatablock-list.description: Text shown directly above list of users found in encrypted blob

discovereddatablock-title.description: Title shown for block containing list of all users found in an encrypted blob

header-load.description: Title text in header when Load Activity is active

header-main.description: Title text in header when no activity has been selected

header-save.description: Title text in header when Save Activity is active

keyinputblock-label.description: Label shown directly above blob ID number input field

keyinputblock-title.description: Title shown for block that prompts user for the blob ID

loadactivity-instructions.defaultMessage: Please fill out the following and then press Next.
loadactivity-instructions.description: Load activity instructions for the top of the screen

messagebox-close.description: This message is read by screen-readers when they are focused on the close button of error messages

nextbutton-button.description: Text shown on the next section button

nextbutton-title.description: Title shown for block with button to advance to next section of the activity

saveactivity-input-label.description: Label shown for the input field that user enters plaintext into

saveactivity-input-title.description: Title shown for block that user enters plaintext into

saveactivity-instructions.defaultMessage: Please fill out the following and then press Next.
saveactivity-instructions.description: Save activity instructions for the top of the screen

saveactivity-success-instructions.defaultMessage: Please save the following link for your records:
saveactivity-success-instructions.description: Instructions shown right before the final link

saveactivity-success-title.description: Title for block that is shown after user's encrypted blob is saved to server

usercredentialblock-instructions.defaultMessage: Enter the username and password here

usercredentialblock-label-password.description: Label shown next to password field

usercredentialblock-label-username.description: Label shown next to username field

usercredentialblock-title.description: Title shown for block where username/password combos are entered
